website_summaries.verdict: Double-walled insulation keeps drinks sweat-free and comes with both hot and cold drink accessories and cleaning brushes.
pros: Hot drinks stay hot for 4 hours, cold drinks stay cold for 16 hours
Sleek design fits in most cup holders, and comes in array of bright colors
100% satisfaction guarantee, and the company will provide a refund or exchange if you don't love it
cons: Hand wash only, though cleaning brushes are provided

customer_reviews.title: Ice cold beverage for hours and hours!
customer_reviews.text: Large size, easy to clean, snug lid, and hours and hours of an ice cold beverage make this insulated tumbler well worth the price. I’m going to be ordering a second one in a different color for hot beverages. Will post a hot beverage update soon.
customer_reviews.author: knitsannechains

customer_reviews.title: Love love !
customer_reviews.text: Wonderful product. I purchased the iron flask bottle a while ago and decided to get the tumbler as well . Sturdy and elegant!
customer_reviews.author: Aly

customer_reviews.title: Coffee spills out drink spout on lid
customer_reviews.text: I have all the iron flask products and figured why not add this one also. I was really looking forward to wanting to like this one but not so much. Now I don’t use the straws but can’t imagine it making too much difference my coffee spills out while driving. I tried getting through a week with it, but on day number three I had enough and at the next stop sign I dumped out my coffee and now I have a shelf ornament. Recommend just getting the 22oz with flip lid but caution my coffee stays hot for too long so I add a little ice at WAWA where I get my coffee.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: comparable to corkicle but cheaper
customer_reviews.text: I love this tumbler. It is comparable to corkicle but cheaper and prettier. Comes with so many extras like straws and straw cleaner brush I was excited, especially for the price. hand wash only for the tumbler itself. I would purchase another one. Fits in my cup holders.
customer_reviews.author: s_nlbauer

customer_reviews.title: Stays icy Cold & No leaking
customer_reviews.text: These are so awesome. No leaking. Great seal and very large. Just the right size for a big olé glass of iced tea!
customer_reviews.author: Ira

customer_reviews.title: One of the greatest tumblers I have purchased
customer_reviews.text: I love this tumbler! Great deal with the accessories you get. No brainer! I have just used this travel tumbler mug for today and I can already tell that I made a great purchase. Holds a good amount of liquid and works for both cold and hot. This meets all my needs during the day for coffee and later for icy water. The vibrant colors offered made choosing the color a difficult task. This feels like a great quality product once you try it. I'm not sure why those expensive brands charge almost double the price. It's probably just the brand name.
customer_reviews.author: Lynn Rihawi

customer_reviews.title: The same quality as a Yeti but a fraction of the cost!
customer_reviews.text: Amazing hot or cold cup. Will hold ice 10+ hrs or keep your coffee hot for several hours.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: I love this
customer_reviews.text: I bought one of these to trial. I need to drink lots of water each day and it's handy to have a larger container. I put ice in the container in the evening and the next morning the ice was still present, so it really does keep things cold for a long time. It holds the heat much longer than my regular coffee cups. At first it felt a little heavy compared to my Starbucks venti-sized reusable double-walled plastic glass, but it works so much better that I got used to it quickly and ordered a second one. Recommended
customer_reviews.author: Pamela H.

customer_reviews.title: Works but finish is not as durable as had hoped.
customer_reviews.text: Use this daily to ramp up my water intake. Admittedly I start the morning with a large iced coffee which is less healthy, but it's large enough to have a mug of coffee, a heap of ice and a full cup of chocolate milk. So enjoying this cup from the start of the day to end. However it is not dishwasher safe, and the finish has chipped and flaked and it's only a few days old. Oh well it was nice looking out of the box.
customer_reviews.author: Andrew C

customer_reviews.title: So girly!
customer_reviews.text: Being an adult is so weird. I can’t even tell you how excited that I was when my new tumbler came in the mail today. I’ve been drinking a lot more water (at work especially) since I have to wear a mask...I get so thirsty and this is a nice size to accommodate. I honestly bought it because the color is awesome and that’s the only reason why but it actually works nicely.
customer_reviews.author: Randi Wink

customer_reviews.title: Love this Iron Flask Tumbler! And what a fantastic deal!
customer_reviews.text: I LOVE ❤️ this tumbler! This tumbler is exactly as described! It’s more beautiful in person than in the pics, if that’s even possible! It truly keeps my cold drinks cold for many, many hours! I even use it for ice cold water by my bed at night and it keeps the water super cold OVERNIGHT!!! Wonderful tumbler! Would recommend to anyone camping, going on a picnic, or just for every day use! I love that it comes with 2 different metal straw options, 2 plastic straws, and 2 straw cleaners! You SERIOUSLY can not beat the deal on this!!! I’m obsessed with my Iron Flask Tumbler!!!!! Would recommend and buy again and again!!!
customer_reviews.author: JMM

customer_reviews.title: I love my new tumbler!
customer_reviews.text: I love my new tumbler! First of all the color is cute, the size is perfect, its sweat proof and I can not say enough good things about the customer service team. One of my straws had like glue in it so they sent me some replacements, unfortunately the replacements were the wrong size but as soon as I let them know they sent out new replacements for my tumbler, no questions asked. Will definitely be ordering from this company again.
customer_reviews.author: Yaliani schaefer

customer_reviews.title: very nice, love the extras
customer_reviews.text: So fat it has performed well for me, it came with a choice of 4 different straws, 2 metal, 2 plastic. 1 metal straw being curved which is my choice. A feature I really like and almost threw away is the straw cleaning brushes included. Also it has a lifetime warranty if you fill out the card enclosed.
customer_reviews.author: Dencil King

customer_reviews.title: Great cup to keep drinks ice cold!
customer_reviews.text: I don’t know about warmth, but it keeps my ice water ICE COLD! I can fill this cup with ice and water before bed and wake up to find ice still in it. Sometimes the ice is gone, but the water is still freezing cold. We’re talkin’ 10 hours of holding ice and way longer keeping the water cold. Like, I can go to work for 9 hours and the water is still cold from the night before. Well worth the money. and I love the 32oz size. (My mother liked mine so much she ordered herself one in another color.)
customer_reviews.author: kchap3

customer_reviews.title: Well worth the money!
customer_reviews.text: I absolutely love this cup! I use it daily, zero complaints!
customer_reviews.author: Charlie

customer_reviews.title: Doesn’t keep drinks cold
customer_reviews.text: I love the color, shape and size of the cup. I also love the straw options and cleaning utensils. However, I purchased the cup to have ice water at night, and the ice is completely melted 4 hours after I fill it. The drink is cool, but not cold about 6-8 hours after being filled. It doesn’t function as needed so I’ll be returning. I wish it worked better because I really love everything else about it!
customer_reviews.author: Tristin + Emilee C.

customer_reviews.title: Not as impressed as I hoped to be
customer_reviews.text: I bought this after a friend told me about the cup. I do like that it doesn't leak and comes with different sized straws and the brush to clean the straws. However the cup didn't really work at keeping my drinks any colder than anything else I own. I has the same issue with keeping something hot. it's okay but wasn't really what I wanted and or was looking for. I did like the color though it was very pretty.
customer_reviews.author: Jess

customer_reviews.title: Awesome for BFing mamas
customer_reviews.text: This cup is awesome! I like to have a huge cup of water next to me while nursing the baby, and was so upset when my other one (a different brand) went bad. The Iron Flask has held up really well, and I love that it fits in my van cup holders. I haven’t tried it for a hot beverage yet, but it definitely keeps things cold for a long time. And, all the straws that came with it were a definite perk! It’s definitely worth the money.
customer_reviews.author: Michal

customer_reviews.title: Great tumbler!
customer_reviews.text: Love this tumbler! It keeps ice for over 24 hrs and stays cold for up to 2 days without refreshing. I would say it’s better than my yeti. I like the straw option too. It’s not too skinny to where it topples over easy either. I only gave it 4 stars on leak because it will leak around the straw if knocked over. No leak on the lid seal though. I have not used it for warm beverages.
customer_reviews.author: A Leverette

customer_reviews.title: Keeps drinks cold for 12+ hours
customer_reviews.text: I bought a few of these to keep the ice from melting in my drinks during the summer. I've left drinks overnight and the next day the ice had hardly melted. Another added benefit is these do not sweat at all, so I dont have to use a coaster with them. These do dent if you drop them on concrete or other hard surfaces, but at least they dont or crack like plastic ones.
customer_reviews.author: Derrick

customer_reviews.title: A++++
customer_reviews.text: I love this cup. I put ice in my cup this morning and I’m still using the same ice for my water. I drink water all day and need a good cup. This is a favorite of mine now. So glad I purchased.
customer_reviews.author: Katie Andreacchio

customer_reviews.title: Nice tumbler, lame lid.
customer_reviews.text: I really like the “in-between” size of the 24oz tumbler; not too big, not too small. So far, the color coating has not chipped or scraped off. The major drawback is the clear plastic lid, which after a few hand washes has become scratched and cloudy. The silicone rim that prevents leaks is white, or rather, it was white. I drank a sports drink yesterday that stained it orange.
customer_reviews.author: Belden Family

customer_reviews.title: Best purchase ever !
customer_reviews.text: Not exactly leak proof. But honestly the best purchase ive made ... been buying from this company for a bit now and have yet to be disappointed.... not only does this look cute as hell especially with the matching 64oz water tank i got! But add some ice for iced coffee and that ice will last you over 8hrs. So worth it! And way more affordable than any of these other hipster brands!
customer_reviews.author: DarraLeigh

customer_reviews.title: Great value
customer_reviews.text: Super impressed with how long it holds ice...left large ice cubes in for a full 24hrs and they were still in tact! And not almost melted they were still pretty solid. Also left it in my car in the hot sun for 2 hours n ice was still solid. The lid is also very secure it actually takes a good amount of effort to get the thing off. Overall great buy. Only reason I put 4 stars in leak proof is bc of the straw hole but there’s really no way to avoid it
customer_reviews.author: Amanda Cohen

customer_reviews.title: Amazing
customer_reviews.text: I received my tumbler yesterday. Used it all day. Even tipped it over on purpose. No problems. I filled it with crushed ice and water at 6p last night - this morning at 9a I still have ice in this cup. No problem with the cup sweating at all. The napkin it sat on was completely dry. I am getting another one.
customer_reviews.author: Gerry

customer_reviews.title: Very high quality at a competitive price.
customer_reviews.text: Perfect size for cold iced drinks. This will keep a drink cold all day. I already had the “other” brand, but it’s just a bit too small. This one works equally well. The only differences are cost (this brand is less expensive) and the lid. I prefer the magnetic slide lid so I ordered a pair separately.
customer_reviews.author: Dublin Bob

customer_reviews.title: Great cup, love the color combo.
customer_reviews.text: This cup is well worth the money. I love the dual color combo, I got the black and white. It is awesome. It keeps my coffee nice and warm for a few hours as long as I keep the lid on. Cleaning is easy due to the tools included with the purchase. I think this would make great gifts for the office.
customer_reviews.author: Uriah11

customer_reviews.title: You won’t regret it!
customer_reviews.text: I cannot brag about this product enough! It is amazing! I put cold water in it the night before and the next morning it was still just as cold! It has kept my drink cold in a car when it’s 95 degrees outside! The color is beautiful. I love love this and will be buying more
customer_reviews.author: Jenny Q.

customer_reviews.title: Quality Product
customer_reviews.text: Big, sturdy, leak-proof and so pretty! I just received mine, so I washed it (hand wash only) and made some iced, matcha green tea. I love the metal straws! My tea was ice cold from first sip to last. It arrived quickly and securely packaged in a sturdy box. Great purchase!
customer_reviews.author: MzCat

customer_reviews.title: Fine but not great for keeping ice water cold 12+ hrs
customer_reviews.text: Did not keep contents cold for more than 10 hours or so, which was a disappointment. I was hoping that it would would keep ice water cold for 24 hrs but this has not been the case. Still a decent water vessel, just not as effective at maintaining coldness as I had hoped.
customer_reviews.author: Winnie

customer_reviews.title: Must have! Get it... you wont regret it!
customer_reviews.text: Beautiful! Will return in the future when ready to replace or even to get a new color! I love it, I was concerned on the aize but when it arrived just check my photo... I have large female handa and this is the size of this cup.... plus came with 2 metal straws and 2 plastic and cleaning brushes for the straws...totally worth the money!
customer_reviews.author: Short Straight White Party Bobo Wig

customer_reviews.title: Slurp
customer_reviews.text: Been using this product for a month. I love it!! I use it all day everyday. Im drinking waay more water. It stay cold all day. 32 oz is a good size to not have to keep filling but not too big to hold. I like that i have multiple straws. The lid is secure. High quality. Id buy it again
customer_reviews.author: Jenny B

customer_reviews.title: Keeps items cold for hours, even in sun. Does not sweat!
customer_reviews.text: I use this for work to limit my trips for refills, then continue to use it at home. I love the straws and the brushes to clean them. I filled it at 8:00 pm with ice & water, drank and refilled with tap water. I left it out all night and at 8:00 am it still had a fair amount of ice left. Also have kept it in a hot car for approx 3 hours... still ice cold. It is a little on the heavy side, but I love it!
customer_reviews.author: Mary

customer_reviews.title: Not as good as 24oz for maintaining temp
customer_reviews.text: This keeps the temperature cooler, but it is not as good as the 24oz. The ice melts within a couple of hours, so I am disappointed with that. I have tons of other products from this company and love every one. This cup just has something a bit off.
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: Amazing!
customer_reviews.text: I bought this tumbler and also purchased the hydroflask tumbler lid - perfect fit! Keeps my water cold for hours, fits in the sleeve on the side of my backpack, and the color (I got white) hasn’t chipped or gotten dirty. For the price, the product is surprisingly high quality. I was pleasantly surprised by the number of straws that come with it.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Cold Water in the Morning
customer_reviews.text: Not only is this a beautiful “cup” but it does a great job of keeping my water cold. Love waking up for a sip of water and it is still cold. No sweat either, like you get from plastic double line cups. Just bought 2 more!
customer_reviews.author: Dawn C

customer_reviews.title: When you care enough, to get the very best!
customer_reviews.text: This isn't my first purchase of Iron Flask products, and very likely it won't be my last. They are just awesome and I've found a new product to brag about to anyone that is looking for an Insulated Tumbler. Great job!
customer_reviews.author: Peggy

customer_reviews.title: Non sealed lid. Made only for straw so leaks
customer_reviews.text: Be aware that the lid that comes with this does not is made for a straw so it does not have a seal to cover the straw hole. If you are looking for a tumbler that can seal You need to get another tumbler or purchase a separate lid
customer_reviews.author: desiree m.

customer_reviews.title: Great thermal tumblers at a good price!
customer_reviews.text: These are great thermal tumblers. I bought two of them them for the beach house and they are perfect. The lime green color has a very party feel and they keep drinks cool on a hot day in the sand with no worries. I highly recommend them in lieu of Yeti
customer_reviews.author: Christopher

customer_reviews.title: Excellent sturdy cup that keeps drinks cold
customer_reviews.text: Excellent tumblers. I find that I now dunno more water throughout the day now that I carry this with me. I normally have drinks with ice and have left this tumbler in my hot car for an hour or two and my water was still cold and ice cubes were still present. I'm and extremely clumsy person, and I can attest that these are excellent cups that will take a fall with little ones. I absolutely love this, so much so that I bought another in the lime.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Perfect thermos Cup!
customer_reviews.text: Color is gorgeous! It isn't too heavy of a cup. Set of four straws and two cleaners comes with it. Also has a lifetime warranty. I love it. Definitely getting more! Coffee stays hot for a long period of time, but I drink my coffee pretty quickly so dont have a time frame.
customer_reviews.author: Nicole

customer_reviews.title: This is better than a yeti
customer_reviews.text: It’s the perfect tumbler! Comes with 4 straws-2 metal and 2 plastic, as well as cleaners! The color is great, it keeps my iced latte cold for hours, and I put ice in it for later and forgot about it until evening, but 12 hours later it was still ice!
customer_reviews.author: Alexandria Nalepa

customer_reviews.title: Great so far
customer_reviews.text: I’ve only had this cup one day so I don’t know how it holds up over time and haven’t tried a hot drink yet so I wont give 5 stars yet. I can say that my ice coffee stayed cold for hours and my ice never melted! I love the color options. It would be even better if I could put it in the dishwasher, but not the end of the world.
customer_reviews.author: Shawna Gire

customer_reviews.title: Great Product!
customer_reviews.text: Awesome product! Keeps drinks cold all day and all night. Ice does not melt. Also keeps drinks warm for hours. Attractive design and colors. I got the two tone blue one. Love the curved straw too.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Really nice
customer_reviews.text: Was looking for something to replace my Yeti, which rusted. I like the color patterns these come in. I’ve only used it for cold liquids and it did it’s job. Came with free straws.
customer_reviews.author: Jo

customer_reviews.title: Awesome product
customer_reviews.text: Love the paint work. Comes with 4 straws, 2 durable plastic ones, 1 straight stainless steel and 1 bent stainless steel. Cover fits better with hot sontents as opposed to cold ones, but for the price it's totally worth it.
customer_reviews.author: Jason

customer_reviews.title: Great tumbler in wonderful colors
customer_reviews.text: I absolutely love this color! It keeps my drinks iced overnight and is the perfect size to hold and fit in a cup holder. I loved it so much I ordered a second for me and one for my daughter!
customer_reviews.author: D. Blaskie

customer_reviews.title: Best brand ever!
customer_reviews.text: I have the water bottle and two cups. I love that I can put ice in the cup and depending on how much ice I put in it it can last all day. I also use one cup to keep on my night stand and I put water and ice in the cup and in the morning the ice is still there. This is such a great brand for a reasonable price.
customer_reviews.author: Christina Zuniga

customer_reviews.title: Mostly love it!
customer_reviews.text: I do love this cup. It’s pretty colors, fits into cup holders, and keeps my water cold for long periods of time which is why I bought it. The only thing I don’t like is the lid. It’s not spill proof. It’ll leak if dropped and when I’m walking with stroller any bump sends water flying out of the hole if the cup is 3/4 -
customer_reviews.author: B.Cool

customer_reviews.title: Great Product with 1 gripe
customer_reviews.text: I love using this thing for my cold drinks as it keeps them cool and my ice doesn't disappear within 5 minutes of it sitting to the side. All in all it does what it needs to beautifully, my only issue is that the seal ring on the lid comes out almost every time I pop it open to refill. I'm not sure if it's a defect or a design flaw, but all in all it's really only a minor issues as I just have to pop it back in and all is well.
customer_reviews.author: Daniel Stinchcomb

customer_reviews.title: Love it!
customer_reviews.text: This cup is great, I love it, it doesn't seem heavy to me either. The gradient colors are so cute. The Iron Flask silicone boot fits this as well, the smaller size boot (14-22oz) fits perfectly on my 32oz tumbler since it is smaller at the bottom. I don't like metal straws because of the taste/sound lol, so I got some silicone straws that work wonderful also. Very happy with it!
customer_reviews.author: tonya wagoner

customer_reviews.title: Just get it
customer_reviews.text: Don’t think just get it. It’s absolutely wonderful . So sleek and so well built. Sturdy. Love all the straws and brush that come with it. And so affordable! Best purchase ever
customer_reviews.author: kowkow

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful tumbler
customer_reviews.text: Absolutely love the look and feel of this tumbler. I am so glad it came with multiple straws and a tool to clean them. I had ice water on my night stand overnight and the ice was still there in the morning!
customer_reviews.author: Abigail

customer_reviews.title: size matters
customer_reviews.text: I rarely leave reviews, but i love this tumblr. The height and weight and it's easy to clean. Perfect for my smoothies and a fun way to stay hydrated
customer_reviews.author: LynnS

customer_reviews.title: Love it.
customer_reviews.text: This tumbler is amazing. I love the color. I love that it keeps my drinks cold. I love that I drink more water because I keep this handy. I just plain love it. I will be purchasing more Iron Flask items in the future.
customer_reviews.author: Trichelle

customer_reviews.title: Great product!
customer_reviews.text: Very pleased! Keeps drinks cold & hot; as described. Colors are beautiful; as shown. I fill my 32 ounce Iron Flask with filtered water each day, & add fresh squeezed lemon, lime or fruit of choice, or Skinny Syrup, if desired. Great choice of straws!
customer_reviews.author: Velvet

customer_reviews.title: This item isn’t near as good as the rest of the items I’ve bought
customer_reviews.text: I’m so disappointed. This is my 3rd item purchased and it does not compare at all to the others. My ice melts within the hour. The other 2 are awesome I think I got a defective item. Very very disappointed.
customer_reviews.author: Kelly

customer_reviews.title: Great Cup
customer_reviews.text: I absolutely love this cup...my ice stays frozen for hours...it come an with 4 straws and 2 straw cleaners. I had a smoothie in it yesterday and it started cold the entire time!
customer_reviews.author: Celise Jackson

customer_reviews.title: Love this
customer_reviews.text: I love everything about this! It is definitely worth the money. The color is beautiful & I will be using this everyday
customer_reviews.author: Nae

customer_reviews.title: Gorgeous color!
customer_reviews.text: This is my 2nd Iron Flask product I’ve bought. LOVE this tumbler! Keeps my drinks cool for so long. Love the color of this one as well.
customer_reviews.author: Shellnz

customer_reviews.title: Best cup I’ve owned !!!
customer_reviews.text: Fantastic cup. It keeps ice For hours, even over night. I use mine for iced coffees and it doesn’t hold the smell of coffee even after being hand washed. Better than my yeti !
customer_reviews.author: Tara Mynatt

customer_reviews.title: Better than hydroflask
customer_reviews.text: I love this cup. I use it every day. Ice will still be frozen over night. Perfect size for my car cup holder and easy to clean.
customer_reviews.author: Jennifer Silveira

customer_reviews.title: Gorgeous!
customer_reviews.text: This cup is gorgeous, and it came with so many straws! My daughters immediately wanted them too, so we ordered two more.
customer_reviews.author: Thrifty Shopper

customer_reviews.title: Love! Just one thing!
customer_reviews.text: LOVE my cup! I use it for water and it keeps it nice and cool all throughout the day, plus all the straw options that come with it are amazing!! I just wish the cup itself was dishwasher safe, but it's not too hard to clean :)
customer_reviews.author: Kenzie Baker

customer_reviews.title: Buy me
customer_reviews.text: Great product. Small & light enough to easily lift when full (or kinda small hands). Sharp looking, too
customer_reviews.author: Beez

customer_reviews.title: Life changing love it
customer_reviews.text: I love my cup soooo much I keep it with me at all times keeps drinks so cold for such a long time !!! Dosen't water down your drinks with melted ice . I love all the straws that come with it and the straw cleaners !! I bought one for my mom and dad because everyone needs one in there life !!
customer_reviews.author: Kari S

customer_reviews.title: Absolutely Amazing
customer_reviews.text: One of the best tumblers I've ever had. This tumbler keeps the coffee very hot for a really long time and my coffee almost tastes better in this than in a regular coffee mug. I have no complaints about this product. I love that you get a variety of straws and cleaning objects for it. I absolutely love it and highly recommend it.
customer_reviews.author: JAC

customer_reviews.title: Great buy
customer_reviews.text: I keep walking around the house saying it’s such a good purchase haha. I love it, I chose the cotton candy pink and blue and it’s so beautiful. Keeps my drinks cold all day. I had ice cubes in my cup with some water and left it overnight, the next morning the ice cubes were still in there and my water was still cold.
customer_reviews.author: Sharlene Rivera

customer_reviews.title: I was gagged : worth every penny. Girl this is fire.
customer_reviews.text: I was skeptical to buy a not we known brand. I am extremely happy I did - this tumblr is amazing and I want to recommend it to everyone.
customer_reviews.author: Oscar morales

customer_reviews.title: Nice size!
customer_reviews.text: Love the large size of the 32 oz because I drink a lot of water! Only wish it had a lid that was better sealed around the straw but it’s still great!
customer_reviews.author: Alexa B.

customer_reviews.title: Amazing product
customer_reviews.text: Perfect. I love it. I bought 2 and I’m thinking of getting another for my son. Had ice in mine All day and it did not melt. I live in the tropics so I love that fact.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: AMAZINGGGG
customer_reviews.text: definitely the best water tumblr or thermos i bought. i’ve only ever put cold drinks inside but it really lasts up to 12 hours freezing cold! Even in 100 degree weather ice will last up to 6 hours in this. i take it to school, work, i use it as my water bottle at night, definitely the best investment i’ve purchased. i purchased another today for storage. i highly recommend
customer_reviews.author: Haala

customer_reviews.title: It’s awesome
customer_reviews.text: It’s just the perfect size and everything. I’m so glad I bought this. I needed a new one for my water at home.
customer_reviews.author: Jennifer Niva Chavez

customer_reviews.title: Terrible
customer_reviews.text: This flask only keeps water cold for 3 to 4 hours but claims it is good for 12 hours. Totally false. I am very disappointed. I had a tumbler that kept drinks cold all night and that is what I expected. Do not buy this tumbler.
customer_reviews.author: CATT

customer_reviews.title: New favorite cup!
customer_reviews.text: This cup is amazing! I added my own decals. I love how big it is yet still fits easily in cup holders. The colors are beautiful.
customer_reviews.author: Amazonshopper 413

customer_reviews.title: love it!!!
customer_reviews.text: This is great!!! My daughter gifted this to her dad for Father's day, and quite frankly, I'm considering getting one for myself. Sometimes I struggle to get the lid off but I consider that a good thing, it's very sealed. Love the stainless steel straws!!!
customer_reviews.author: S.S.

customer_reviews.title: Looks great! Stays cold!
customer_reviews.text: I love everything about this cup!! It's good looking. It fits in my cupholders. It's easy to hold, and best of all it keeps my drinks super cold! I put ice and iced tea in it yesterday at noon, drove around with it in my car all day, and it still has ice in it today at 2pm! Definitely worth buying.
customer_reviews.author: Jill Reynolds

customer_reviews.title: This is a fantastic cup. It keeps my ice for over 12 hours
customer_reviews.text: This is a fantastic cup. It keeps my ice for over 12 hours
customer_reviews.author: Wendy Rawley Team

customer_reviews.title: Great cup
customer_reviews.text: I've been using this cup for my water and other cold drinks. It keeps ice most of the day and I love that it came with 2 plastic straws, a straight metal straw and a curves metal straw. I will be buying more, ao many different color choices
customer_reviews.author: Courtney

customer_reviews.title: metal straws taste so strong metalic
customer_reviews.text: This tumbler comes with two metal straws.. metal straws smells like metal.. can't use them due to metal tastes. I am keeping the timbler because I like the size and color but I hate metal taste straws!!
customer_reviews.author: Min Choi

customer_reviews.title: Awesome!
customer_reviews.text: Love it! Complete drink package with lid, straws, cleaners and a great product! This isn’t comparable with top of the line drink ware, it is equally among the best of the best!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Love this!
customer_reviews.text: Great tumbler, love the colors and it keeps drinks cold for quite awhile
customer_reviews.author: Nikki Moore

customer_reviews.title: Great insulation
customer_reviews.text: This is a great tumbler for keeping cold drinks cold. (Haven’t used it for hot drinks.) I left ice water in it overnight and it was still cold in the morning!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Perfect and beautiful colors
customer_reviews.text: I love this brand and always suggest it over hydro flask or any other.
customer_reviews.author: Kylie McNeely

customer_reviews.title: Fire
customer_reviews.text: Great, fun BUT I never got the straw that bent just 2 regular straws. Besides that it's really workin out well
customer_reviews.author: james stjohn

customer_reviews.title: Stays cool the entire day.
customer_reviews.text: The product is true to its word and really keeps the drink cool. Lovely look and comes with great tools.
customer_reviews.author: Sohini

customer_reviews.title: Love it!
customer_reviews.text: I love that this cup is easy to pick up with one hand from a cup holder, even with tiny hands. Beautiful color, keeps drinks cold all day, just as good as the more expensive cups. Haven’t tried anything hot yet, so I can’t comment on that, but very pleased with this cup. Plan on purchasing more.
customer_reviews.author: Gingie77

customer_reviews.title: Disappointed
customer_reviews.text: My Ozark works a lot better and was a lot cheaper.
customer_reviews.author: T80

customer_reviews.title: As expected
customer_reviews.text: Perfect 16oz Flask. Fast shipping, well packaged, no dents or damages.
customer_reviews.author: Svitlana/Artem Savonenko

customer_reviews.title: Just as good as name brand
customer_reviews.text: I love this tumbler. I take it everywhere with me and it keeps things cold ALL DAY LONG. Highly recommend this if you’re looking for a YETI or HYDRO FLASK knock off
customer_reviews.author: Chloe

customer_reviews.title: Excellent
customer_reviews.text: It does keep liquid cold, even the ice remains after hours
customer_reviews.author: Blue

customer_reviews.title: Love this cup!!!!!!!
customer_reviews.text: Hands down my new favorite cup!!! I get asked daily where I got it! Love love love!!!
customer_reviews.author: Wandadavis

customer_reviews.title: Love this Cup !!
customer_reviews.text: All that I would recommend is that it have a covering for the input where the straw goes!!
customer_reviews.author: Rissy

customer_reviews.title: Nice!
customer_reviews.text: This thing is awesome, and deserves the current praise. I've kept ice in this thing for DAYS at a time on the occasion. The only thing I don't like is how it's always open. It'd be nice if you could shut it with a secondary 'door' where the lid hole is.
customer_reviews.author: Sterling

customer_reviews.title: Best travel mug!
customer_reviews.text: I’ve never had a mug keep my coffee so hot that it was still burning my mouth two hours later! I am in love with this brand and this mug and I’ll be purchasing from them again in the future! You can’t beat the value on this.
customer_reviews.author: Vic

customer_reviews.title: Love my cup!
customer_reviews.text: Love my cup! Keeps my iced tea cold for hours and hours! Just ordered another one for my mother in law!
customer_reviews.author: Lori Anthony

customer_reviews.title: Great cup for the price!
customer_reviews.text: It keeps the drink cold for a long time and the outer coating is really durable and pretty. I love this cup!
customer_reviews.author: Stacey Donahue

customer_reviews.title: Doesn’t hold up
customer_reviews.text: Started out great, but this cup doesn’t hold up. Within a few weeks, the lid became loose and the insulation stopped functioning. If you’re looking for quality and longevity, do yourself a favor and spring for a Yeti.
customer_reviews.author: K Pierce

customer_reviews.title: So pretty and durable
customer_reviews.text: Such amazing quality and so pretty. Extremely durable! Love that it comes with the straws!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Will keep your drink cold 12+ hrs.
customer_reviews.text: It keeps your drink cold for 12+ hours and doesn't sweat...love it.
customer_reviews.author: Janet

product_meta.title: IRON °FLASK Classic Tumbler - 32 Oz, Vacuum Insulated Stainless Steel, Hot Cold, Modern Double Walled, Simple Thermo Travel Mug, Hydro Water Metal Canteen (Violet)
product_meta.description:
Color:Violet| Size:32 Oz

TAKE ADVANTAGE OF OUR SPECIAL INTRODUCTORY PRICE! 

Your search for the best tumbler is over! Say hello to the best tumbler out there, IRON FLASK! 

 Stay hydrated in style with our classic tumber. Easy to clean and maintain, our tumblers come with a collection of accessories to address your needs. The IRON FLASK tumbler is made of premium 18/8 stainless steel that is 100% BPA FREE. This tumbler will keep your drinks cold & hot for many hours! It will also never sweat no matter what the drink temperature.

What are you waiting for? Go ahead and order the #IRONFLASK already! Lifetime Warranty against manufacturing defects if registered through our website 

Share a picture of your Iron Flask on Instagram with the #ironflask and by tagging @ironflask
feature_bullets: SPECIAL INTRODUCTORY PRICE! CLASSIC TUMBLER: Goodbye sweat! The double wall insulation makes the Iron Flask Tumbler sweat-free! It keeps your drink COLD for up to 16 hours, and HOT for up to 4 hours. The 16oz keeps cold up to 12 hours and hot up to 3 hours. Our tumblers fit in most standard cup holders.
ACCESSORIES: Our Classic Tumbler package includes 2 Stainless Steel Straws, 2 Plastic Straws, and 2 Straw Cleaning Brushes.
18/8 PREMIUM STAINLESS STEEL: Iron Flask is made of 18/8 Stainless steel that is 100% BPA free and non-toxic. It will never leave a metal taste or rust. HAND WASH ONLY WITH SOAPY HOT WATER!

FUNCTIONAL DESIGN: The powder coat exterior finish is a classic. It assures that you stand out with a very durable and elegant bottle. Our logo is now LASER ENGRAVED to assure the highest quality as well.

100% SATISFACTION GUARANTEED: We guarantee that the high quality Iron Flask tumbler will surely please you! If, for any reason, you are not 100% satisfied with the Iron Flask, we will issue you a full refund or an exchange!
